hero.headline: Artisan vegan pastries crafted fresh daily with Montreal love
hero.subheadline: Experience the magic of plant-based baking at Montreal's most beloved cruelty-free bakehouse, where organic ingredients meet traditional French techniques

features.title: Why Green Crumbs Stands Apart in Montreal
features.subtitle: Our unwavering commitment to quality, sustainability, and community has made us Montreal's favorite destination for exceptional vegan pastries

feature1.title: 100% Certified Organic Ingredients
feature1.description: Every croissant, tart, and pastry is lovingly crafted with certified organic, locally-sourced plant-based ingredients, ensuring maximum flavor, nutrition, and environmental responsibility.

feature2.title: Same-Day Carbon-Neutral Delivery
feature2.description: Order before 3 PM and enjoy fresh pastries delivered to your door via our eco-friendly electric bike fleet, serving all of Montreal with zero carbon footprint.

feature3.title: Seasonal Quebec Harvest Creations
feature3.description: Our master bakers collaborate with local Quebec farmers to create limited-edition seasonal pastries that celebrate the province's incredible agricultural heritage and flavors.

testimonial1.text: This platform has transformed how we operate. The efficiency gains are remarkable and the support team is outstanding.
testimonial1.author: Chef Marie-Claire Dubois
testimonial1.quote: I'm a lifelong pastry connoisseur, and these vegan croissants are absolutely indistinguishable from traditional French ones. The technique here is extraordinary!

testimonial2.text: Implementation was seamless and the ROI was evident within the first month. Highly recommended for any growing business.
testimonial2.author: Alexandre Garneau
testimonial2.quote: Green Crumbs has completely revolutionized plant-based baking in Montreal. Their seasonal maple pecan tarts are pure poetry on a plate.

testimonial3.text: The best investment we've made for our company. It's intuitive, powerful, and has excellent customer support.
testimonial3.author: Dr. Priya Sharma
testimonial3.quote: As someone who went vegan for health reasons, I never thought I'd enjoy pastries again. Green Crumbs proved me beautifully wrong - now I'm a daily customer!
